title: Hoes will be hoes
body: It's unfortunate that in our male dominated society, the only opportunity some women have is to sell their looks or body. That being said there are more to hoes than booty shaking mamas. There are people in general regardless of gender who profit off their looks. Whether that is as simple as a first impression in an interview or as complicated as a marriage founded on appearance. This is not a judgment piece; more of a realization from having had the luxury of being on both sides of the transaction. Nobody should dictate how you live your life but when you're a hoe it's important that the same reason you profit will be the same reason you lose.
